description: Really cool app, integrates well and looks very good. Nextcloud/WebDAV Sync would be an additional feature
Simple, and works exactly like expected

Using IPlan is a joy. Even though I can't access my tasks on my phone, I love logging in to my laptop and ticking tasks off. It feels so satisfying. I love how well the app follows GNOME's style, the time tracking makes me feel more focused, and organising my tasks into projects and categories is really easy. A real gem. If we could have some way to sync tasks in the future that would be the icing on the cake.
I think this software is a perfect TODO type application but, I have noticed a problem with this application along with many others on Discover is that they have a tendency to choke up the CPU.
